abstract: The investment banking and alternative investment units will be brought under one leader.  This morning, an analyst at Deutsche Bank downgraded the stock.
snippet: The investment banking and alternative investment units will be brought under one leader.  This morning, an analyst at Deutsche Bank downgraded the stock.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup’s embattled chairman and chief executive, Charles O. Prince III, announced a major reorganization and management shake-up last night as questions linger about his ability to run the giant bank. This morning, an analyst at Deutsche Bank downgraded the stock.

headline.main: Big Shake-Up as Citigroup Combines Two Key Units
headline.print_headline: Big Shake-Up As Citigroup Combines Two Key Units

byline.original: By Landon Thomas Jr. and Eric Dash
